reflections.text: Today I craved my salad formula instead of junk food!

timeline.title: Initial Goal: Lose 10 pounds
timeline.description: I want to feel more confident in my body

timeline.title: Adjusted: 10-day movement challenge
timeline.description: Found I really enjoy morning yoga flows

timeline.title: Current: Healthy eating habits
timeline.description: Created my own salad formula that I actually crave!

reflections.text: Mid-August conquer: gym is my second home!

timeline.title: Week 1: Good Start!
timeline.description:
**The Good:**
- Gym became my second home
- Completed many workout sessions (training + treadmill)
- Made significant posture corrections
- Feeling life-changing progress!

**The Bad:**
- Didn't enjoy the diet most evenings
- Posture correction process was painful

timeline.title: Week 2: Problem found!
timeline.description:
**Progress:**
- Identified my posture problems
- Feel like the universe is helping me reach my goal
- My gym is perfect for my needs:
  - Great for Pilates training
  - Ideal for posture correction
- Showing strong workout commitment

**Observations:**
- Less tiring than Week 1
- Body is adapting to the soreness

timeline.title: Week 3-mid: Get it now!
timeline.description: I feel like i understand how to strengthen my left part of my body now

timeline.title: Week 3: Routine is built happily!
timeline.description:
**Progress:**
-Now its comfortable and easy for me to have a heavy cardio session such as bodu Pump + pilates for my core
- I also am reading some theories about body posture.

timeline.title: Week 4: Gym is my happyland!
timeline.description:
**Progress:**
-Its so easy to be commited to workout
- I wanna add some diet into weekly life and treat day during weekend, i dont think it would work out easily, but at least i will try

timeline.title: Mid-August conquer: gym is my second home!
timeline.description:
**Progress:**
- I love workout, workout loves me 
- Posture much better than before,esp core and feet 
- **Plan:**
- I still need to work on correcting the alignment of my lower body with better balanced core (such as Pilates.
- The alignment in the upper half of my body is also poor; my thoracic posture is compromised. I need to learn how to properly expand my ribcage (open my chest) while maintaining the natural curves of my spine.

reflections.text: To watch less videos, I decided to read more books about physiotherapy to learn more knowledge
I have more passion in the physio area than i thought! Actions speak louder!
Summarize and post content on Red

goals.title: Sexy Salad Challenge(2 weeks)
goals.description: Salad is my new crush and i am in love with it

timeline.title: Challenge starting...
timeline.description: Started a new diet challenge for myself, i think its gonna be fun~

timeline.title: Going on well...
timeline.description:
I think its the first time i know how to control the diet in a healthy way. . 
- I hope I could maintain this, and i hope my weight can continue going down in a bigger picture

timeline.title: Going on super well...
timeline.description:
I think this one is working, since i forget about the weekly cheat day, instead, i just follow it in a more flexible way 
- I am contining losing weight even i have had some bad days and its what i want 
- Its proving, i want it, i get it !
